name: pillion
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a seat or place behind the person riding a motorcycle where a passenger can sit: Perched precariously on the pillion, her arms around his waist, she giggled with delight He even took me to a charity ball on the pillion, all dressed up in my long gown!
Westend61/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesMum climbed on the pillion, tying a headscarf around her head, and we were off."Hop on," he said, patting the pillion.

behind the person riding a motorcycle, bicycle, or horse: The pillion seat is about size of matchbox! She was a pillion passenger on his motorcycle when it crashed.
More examplesFewer examplesA motorcyclist and pillion rider were slightly hurt after their machine crashed.Tom brought him back on the pillion seat of his bike.The bike has good suspension and comfortable seating for both rider and pillion passenger.
